description: Enhance the spot price page with improved clock chart visuals, hover interactions, and a horizontal bar chart with expandable quarter-hour details

tasks.title: Fix clock chart tooltip positioning
tasks.description: The tooltip is appearing in the wrong position (floating at top-left instead of near the hovered segment). Fix the tooltip positioning in spot-clock-chart.blade.php. The tooltip should appear centered above the hovered segment, not at a fixed position. Calculate position based on the segment's actual coordinates (use the path's center point based on hour angle). Update the showTooltip function to position tooltip correctly near the hovered segment.

tasks.title: Fix clock chart hour markers being cut off
tasks.description: The hour markers (00, 06, 12, 18) are being slightly cut off at the edges. In spot-clock-chart.blade.php, increase the viewBox size from 400 to 440 (or adjust as needed) and update cx/cy to center the clock properly. Also increase markerRadius to ensure hour labels have enough space and are fully visible.

tasks.title: Replace quarter number cards with mini horizontal bar charts
tasks.description: In spot-price.blade.php, replace the quarter-hour number cards with mini horizontal bar charts. Each quarter should show: time label (05:00-05:15), a small horizontal bar proportional to its price, and the price value. The bars should use the same color coding (green/yellow/orange/red) as the hourly bars. Current quarter should be highlighted with orange. This makes visual comparison much faster than reading numbers.

tasks.title: Remove duplicate Tuntihinnat table
tasks.description: In spot-price.blade.php, remove the 'Tuntihinnat' table section (the table with expandable 15-min details). This is now duplicate information since we have the horizontal bar chart with quarter-hour accordions. Find and remove the entire section starting with '<!-- Hourly Prices Table with Expandable 15-min Details -->' including the table and all its contents.

tasks.title: Build and verify all fixes
tasks.description: Run 'cd laravel && npm run build'. Verify: 1) Clock tooltip appears near hovered segment (not top-left), 2) Hour markers (00, 06, 12, 18) are fully visible, 3) Quarter accordion shows mini bar charts instead of number cards, 4) Tuntihinnat table is removed. Create git commit with all fixes.
